description:
If you were granted three wishes, what would you choose? Health, wealth and happiness?

More confidence? Higher self esteem?

Some people seem to ooze self-confidence and inner strength - and their secret is simply in their ability to self-coach. This course takes you through everything you need to know in order to practice the art of self-coaching with NLP (neuro-linguistic programming).

In this step-by-step guide you'll be introduced to strategies, tools and techniques that will boost your self-esteem, raise your inner confidence and allow you to tackle any challenge with deeper levels of resilience.

As your course coach, I'll be with you every step of the way, with instruction, encouragement, activities for practice, regular discussion and updates.

If you're tired of feeling like you'll fail before you start, or fed up with being passed over for promotion by someone more forthcoming, this course has the answers for you.

If you're happy with how you handle most situations, but there's one particular challenge that seems to get you every time, this course has the strategies you need.

You don't need any previous knowledge of NLP, just a commitment and desire to give yourself the best chance of success. The course curriculum last for approximately two hours, but you'll learn tools and techniques you can carry with you for a lifetime. NLP has a magnifying effect - learn it once, but experience it ten-fold and more with practice.

Never feel like a fish out of water again.

There's a perfect blend of theory and practice in this course, so you can see the benefits of what you're learning immediately.

And if you don't feel this course delivers everything you need to self-coach a new inwardly-confident you, you have my personal promise and Udemy's guarantee of a 30-day money-back no-questions refund.

You can't lose. Enroll today and get started on fulfilling that first wish.
title: Coach Yourself Through ANYTHING: Inner Confidence With NLP
